inSilecoMisc

Description

The inSilecoMisc package is a set of miscellaneous and handy R functions written to be used with base R, see the tour vignette for more information.

Note that some of the function and may already be available in other packages (especially in packages of the tidyverse). We used camelCase to name functions (e.g. keepWords()).

So far, we do not intend to release this package on the CRAN. If you however find one (or more) function useful and intend to use it in your own package, please do ðŸ˜„!

Installation

The current development is on GitHub and can be install with the remotes ðŸ“¦:

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("inSileco/inSilecoMisc")

Documentation

On top of the tour vignette, you may be interested in the following post on our blog inSileco

  1. https://insileco.github.io/2019/02/03/creating-empty-data-frames-with-dftemplate-and-dftemplatematch/

  2. https://insileco.github.io/2020/04/14/insilecomisc-0.4.0-part-1/2/

  3. https://insileco.github.io/2020/04/21/insilecomisc-0.4.0-part-2/2/
